definition: Shedao or Snake island in Bohai sea 渤海 off Lüshun 旅順|旅顺 on the tip of the Liaoning peninsula, small rocky island famous for snakes
Snake island viper (Gloydius shedaoensis), feeding on migrating birds

sentences.english: Scientists try to protect Shedao Island on which there are more than 2000O snakes.
sentences.chinese: 科學家努力保護有兩萬多條蛇的蛇島。

sentences.english: Ice expected to drift away in the area around Snakes Island.
sentences.chinese: 靠近蛇島附近的冰將會漂走。

sentences.english: If you want to adventure on Snake Island, you have to apply permission.
sentences.chinese: 如果要想到蛇島去探險，您得申請許可證。
